text: ya 'ayuha alnabiu 'inna 'arsalnak shahdana ealaa amtk b'iblaghhm alrsalt, wmbshrana almuminin minhum balrhmt waljnt, wndhyrana llesat walmukadhibin min alnar, wdaeyana 'iilaa tawhid allah webadth wahdah bi'amrih 'iyak, wsrajana mnyrana liman astnar bk, famrk zahir fima jyt bih min alhaqi kalshms fi 'ishraqha w'ida'tha, la yjhdha 'iilaa meand
